objects.text:
• PERFECTLY MATCHED PINK SET
• CREAMY, LONG-LASTING FORMULA
• MIRROR FOR ON-THE-GO TOUCH-UPS
• DERMATOLOGIST-TESTED

product_details.name: Pink Perfection Duo: Luxe Lipstick & Blush Set
product_details.description:
• Perfectly matched pink lipstick and blush combination for a coordinated look
• Sleek black compact with built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups
• Creamy, long-lasting lipstick formula in a flattering rose pink shade
• Silky-smooth powder blush for a natural-looking flush
• Professional-grade silver bullet lipstick packaging
• Mirror-equipped compact for precise application anywhere
• Highly pigmented formula for buildable color intensity
• Perfect size for purse or makeup bag
• Dermatologist-tested and suitable for all skin types
• Essential beauty duo for achieving that coveted rosy glow

banner_details:
The banner is a visually engaging 1080x1080 square layout divided into four quadrants using soft pink tones and delicate vectors, giving it a feminine and elegant appeal. The top-left features a circular backdrop behind a bold promotional heading (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) emphasizing a limited-time pink makeup combo, followed by a descriptive subheading (`subheading`). The top-right quadrant contains a prominent image of a lipstick and blush (`product_image`). The bottom-left quadrant presents a list of product benefits (`description`), prominently displays the pricing (`price`), and includes a bold rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`). The bottom-right quadrant reinforces the brand message with a tagline (`tagline`) and soft supporting line (`supporting_text`). The subtle circles and line accents throughout the background make it lively yet sophisticated.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFE6EE`, `#FFDBEB`
- Medium Pink: `#FFCCE6`, `#F8A7C7`
- Bold Pink: `#D81B60`, `#FF69B4`
- Deep Plum: `#880E4F`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a lipstick and blush duo in a coordinated soft pink tone, ideal for a fresh and feminine advertisement. The focal color is a vivid pastel pink (#F4A6C2), used both in the lipstick and blush, offering visual harmony. A sleek silver (#C0C0C0) metallic tube and glossy black (#1C1C1C) details frame the product, creating contrast and sophistication. The mirror reflects the blush, subtly enhancing brightness and cohesion. The color palette evokes elegance and modernity, blending vibrant and neutral hues to maintain focus on the pink while using silver and black to ground the composition.
